00019    * Default constructor.
00020    */
00021    RadialDistribution::RadialDistribution() 
00022     : Distribution(),
00023       norm_(0.0),
00024       nSnapshot_(0),
00025       outputIntegral_(false)
00026    {}
00027

00029    * Copy constructor.
00030    */
00031    RadialDistribution::RadialDistribution(const RadialDistribution& other) 
00032     : Distribution(other),
00033       norm_(other.norm_),
00034       nSnapshot_(other.nSnapshot_),
00035       outputIntegral_(other.outputIntegral_)
00036    {}

00038    /* 
00039    * Assignment operator.
00040    */
00041    RadialDistribution& 
00042    RadialDistribution::operator = (const RadialDistribution& other) 
00043    {
00044       // Call base class assignment operator
00045       Distribution::operator=(other);
00046 
00047       // Assign the additional members
00048       norm_        = other.norm_;
00049       nSnapshot_   = other.nSnapshot_;
00050 
00051       return *this;
00052    }
00053    
00054    /* 
00055    * Read parameters and initialize.
00056    */
00057    void RadialDistribution::readParam(std::istream& in)
00058    {
00059       readBegin(in,"RadialDistribution");
00060       min_ = 0.0;
00061       read<double>(in, "max",  max_);
00062       read<int>(in, "nBin", nBin_);
00063       binWidth_ = (max_-min_)/double(nBin_);
00064       histogram_.allocate(nBin_);
00065       clear();
00066       readEnd(in);
00067    }
00068 
00069    /*
00070    * Set parameters and initialize.
00071    */
00072    void RadialDistribution::setParam(double max, int nBin)
00073    {
00074       min_   = 0.0;
00075       max_   = max;
00076       nBin_  = nBin;
00077       binWidth_  = (max_ - min_)/double(nBin_);
00078       histogram_.allocate(nBin_);
00079       clear();
00080    }
00081    
00082    /* 
00083    * Zero accumulators (virtual).
00084    */
00085    void RadialDistribution::clear()
00086    {
00087       Distribution::clear();
00088       nSnapshot_ = 0;
00089    }
00090    
00091    /* 
00092    * Set the factor used to normalize the RDF before output.
00093    */
00094    void RadialDistribution::setNorm(double norm)
00095    {  norm_ = norm; }
00096    
00097    /* 
00098    * Mark the beginning of a snapshot.
00099    */
00100    void RadialDistribution::beginSnapshot() 
00101    { ++nSnapshot_; }
00102    
00103    /* 
00104    * Set outputIntegral true/false to enable/disable output of spatial integral.
00105    */
00106    void RadialDistribution::setOutputIntegral(bool outputIntegral)
00107    { outputIntegral_ = outputIntegral; }
00108    
00109    /*
00110    * Output final results to file.
00111    */
00112    void RadialDistribution::output(std::ostream& out)
00113    {
00114       double r, rho, prefactor, dV, hist, integral;
00115       prefactor = 4.0*3.14159265359/3.0;
00116       prefactor = prefactor*binWidth_*binWidth_*binWidth_;
00117       integral  = 0.0;
00118       for (int i=0; i < nBin_; ++i) {
00119          r    = binWidth_*(double(i) + 0.5);
00120          dV   = prefactor*double(3*i*i + 3*i + 1);
00121          hist = double(histogram_[i])/double(nSnapshot_);
00122          rho  = hist/(dV*norm_);
00123          out << Dbl(r, 18, 8) << Dbl(rho, 18, 8);
00124     if (outputIntegral_) {
00125             integral += (hist - dV*norm_)/norm_;
00126             out << Dbl(integral, 18, 8);
00127          }
00128          out <<  std::endl;
00129       }
00130    }

00134    * Backup statistical accumulators to file.

00136    void RadialDistribution::backup(FILE *file) 
00137    {
00138       fprintf(file, "nSample       %i \n", nSample);
00139       fprintf(file, "nReject       %i \n", nReject);
00140       fprintf(file, "nSnapshot     %li \n", nSnapshot);
00141       for (int i=0; i < nBin; ++i) {
00142          fprintf(file, "%li ", histogram[i]);

00147    /*
00148    * Restore statistical accumulators from file.
00149    */
00150    void RadialDistribution::restore(FILE *file) 
00151    {
00152       fscanf(file, "nSample       %i \n", &nSample);
00153       fscanf(file, "nReject       %i \n", &nReject);
00154       fscanf(file, "nSnapshot     %li \n", &nSnapshot);
00155       for (int i=0; i < nBin; ++i) {
00156          fscanf(file, "%li ", &histogram[i]);
00157       }
00158       fscanf(file, "\n");
00159    }
